title: CME Hikes Precious-Metal Margins Again After Price Swings
description: CME Group raised margin requirements on precious-metal futures for the second time in the space of a week, following a bout of volatility that saw prices spike then retreat.
content: CME Group raised margin requirements on precious-metal futures for the second time in the space of a week, following a bout of volatility that saw prices spike then retreat.
